intro.title: Where silence, nature and soul come together
intro.subtitle: Just 20 minutes from Paramaribo lies Sendang Redjo — a serene lakeside retreat built on historic grounds and shaped by Javanese hospitality. Here, everything slows down, and silence finds its form.

cabanas.title: Cabanas
cabanas.subtitle1: Our cabanas are your private sanctuary on the water — accessible only by boat, so from the moment you arrive, peace surrounds you.
cabanas.subtitle2: Each cabana features a luxurious outdoor lounge, a private kitchen with bar, poolbeds, a hammock, and a modern shower with hot water and toilet. Kayaks, fishing gear and floaties are yours to enjoy — whether you want to explore the lake or drift away in silence.

dining.title: Dining
dining.subtitle1: Experience Javanese cuisine in the heart of nature: slow-cooked over woodfire, seasoned with authentic spices, and served in your private cabana — a culinary journey where flavor and serenity meet.
dining.subtitle2: Dining is fully included with your stay. Relax by the water as you grill your own lunch and enjoy an environment where time seems to stand still. Everything we serve is fresh, honest and prepared with care — the tastes and aromas of Java complete your day of retreat.

activiteiten.title: Activities
activiteiten.subtitle1: Discover the lake at your own pace: kayak peacefully, fish in quiet corners, or float effortlessly in the water. Unwind in your cabana — in your hammock, surrounded only by wind and birds.
activiteiten.subtitle2: And for nature lovers: from kingfishers to herons, no two days look the same.

invite.title: The hidden luxury of Sendang Redjo
invite.subtitle: At Sendang Redjo, you experience a unique blend of tranquility, nature and warm Javanese hospitality — everything designed to immerse you in deep relaxation and sensory richness.
invite.subtitle1text: Designed with Javanese elegance — warm details, soft luxury and panoramic views of the lake.
invite.subtitle2text: No rush, no noise — only nature, silence, and the feeling that time flows slower here.
invite.subtitle3text: Glide quietly across the water, catch your own fish or drift into complete relaxation.
invite.subtitle4text: Slow-cooked over woodfire — pure flavors, warm aromas and tradition at its finest.

reviews.title: What guests take with them from Sendang Redjo
reviews.subtitle: A day by the lake feels longer here than it does at home. These are the moments that stay with our guests long after their visit.

1.name: Auke Klene
1.text: On November 14th, we visited your resort with a group of six. It was truly beautiful. We were welcomed with fresh coconut water and a warm introduction, followed by a lovely boat ride to our cabana. The cabana had everything we needed and we had such a great time together. The BBQ was fantastic! And the boat ride back at dusk… breathtaking, especially with the birds we saw along the way. I wish you a wonderful future with many happy guests. Warm regards,

2.name: Edme Smith
2.text: What a magical place! Whenever we go out, especially so close to Paramaribo, there’s always the risk of loud music and overly enthusiastic crowds. Not at Sendang Redjo: it feels as if you’re completely alone in the world, and you return recharged instead of overstimulated. A true hidden gem of serene beauty! The cabana had everything we needed, the food was delicious, the service was excellent, and we all enjoyed swimming, kayaking and real quality time. Thank you again — we will definitely be back!

3.name: Sara Pawironadi
3.text: We had a fantastic experience at Sendang Redjo — truly something unique. Surrounded by nature, we saw a rainbow across the sky and birds gliding peacefully overhead. The entire retreat felt deeply serene, romantic and full of adventure. It’s the kind of place that touches your soul and makes you feel one with nature. We absolutely recommend it to anyone seeking peace, serenity and a private escape in the heart of nature.

reviews.cta: Let yourself be swept away by even more guest experiences.

cta.title: Ready for your day at the lake?
cta.subtitle: Whether you’re here to escape, or simply breathe — your cabana is waiting for you. We welcome you with open arms, a set table, and a peaceful lake.
cta.highlightText: Just 20 minutes from Paramaribo, you step into a world of silence, water and Javanese hospitality. A hidden luxury for those who choose peace with intention.
